title: Weekend Review, Church Complaints, Snoop Dogg, World Series and more.
itunes:title: Weekend Review, Church Complaints, Snoop Dogg, World Series and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Nothing but gratitude today! Steve has a special project. Dat Damn Junior enjoyed himself at homecoming. A pungent stench is addressed today in Church Complaints, plus more. Happy Belated Born Day to Snoop! Cedric The Entertainer got another movie coming up. The embrace heard 'round the world goes viral. Whoopi got beef with PETA or is it bacon!?!? El Chapo's son gets arrested and released. The World Series is set between Nationals and Astros. Today in Closing Remarks, The CEO warns us to expect the unexpected on our quest to fulfill our dreams and much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
